# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Certain versions of SunDropJs are depracted and/or have security issues.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.0.8   | ☑️                 |
| 0.0.7   | ☑️                 |
| >0.0.6  | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Make a issue then purpose a pull request
